ri:Resource.title: UKIDSS DR1 - UKIRT Infrared Deep Sky Survey Data Release 1

curation.publisher: WFAU, Institute for Astronomy, University of Edinburgh

creator.name: WFAU, Institute for Astronomy, University of Edinburgh

content.subject: Infrared, survey, galaxy, point source
content.description: This DSA hosts data release 1 of the UKIRT Infrared Deep Sky Survey housed at the Wide Field Astronomy Unit at the Univeristy of Edinburgh. This catalog contains WFCAM data primarily originating from the five UKIDSS surveys: Large Area Survey, Galactic Plane Survey, Galactic Clusters Survey, Deep Extragalactic Survey and the Ultra Deep Survey (see the www.ukidss.org for survey descriptions).

capability.description: lasSource: cone search for Large Area Survey Source table
lasDetection: cone search for Large Area Survey Detection table
gcsSource: cone search for Galactic Cluster Survey Source table
gcsDetection: cone search for Galactic Cluster Survey Detection table
gpsSource: cone search for Galactic Plane Survey Source table
gpsDetection: cone search for Galactic Plane Survey Detection table
udsSource: cone search for Ultra Deep Survey Source table
udsDetection: cone search for Ultra Deep Survey Detection table
dxsSource: cone search for Deep Extragalactic Survey Source table
dxsDetection: cone search for Deep Extragalactic Survey Detection table
Access to ADQL queries on all tables in the database (both synchronous and asynchronous)
Access to two applications: general ADQL query, and asynchronous cone-search where relevant/enabled.
